titles: A letter from Maj. General Massey to an honourable person in London
author: Massey, Edward, Sir, 1619?-1674?
Massey, William, 17th cent.
notes: Presumably fictitious; but the general referred to is clearly Sir Edward Massey--cf. NUC pre-1956, v. 368, p. 321.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Commonwealth and Protectorate, 1649-1660.
